field.name: summary
field.value: Generated proxy class has no namespace

field.name: description
field.value:
Generated proxy class has namespace set to a null string. Though it is perfectly valid, this exposes a bug in WPF code (http://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/ViewFeedback.aspx?FeedbackID=422093) preventing to use a proxy in some databinding scenarios. It could also lead to similar bugs in user code making the (incorrect) assumption that namespace must *always* be a non null string for a Type.
(see discussion here: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/browse_thread/thread/f3976006136de434)
